description: Common requirement gap patterns for DoD/Government systems

gap_patterns.name: Missing authentication requirements
gap_patterns.description: No requirements specify how users authenticate (CAC, MFA, SSO)
gap_patterns.recommendation: Specify authentication method (CAC/PIV required for DoD), MFA requirements, and session management

gap_patterns.name: Missing authorization/access control requirements
gap_patterns.description: No requirements define role-based access or privilege management
gap_patterns.recommendation: Define user roles, permissions matrix, least privilege principle, and account management

gap_patterns.name: Missing encryption requirements
gap_patterns.description: No requirements specify data-at-rest or data-in-transit encryption
gap_patterns.recommendation: Specify FIPS 140-2/3 validated encryption for data at rest and in transit

gap_patterns.name: Missing audit/logging requirements
gap_patterns.description: No requirements define what events are logged or audit trail requirements
gap_patterns.recommendation: Define auditable events, log retention, log protection, and audit review frequency

gap_patterns.name: Missing data retention requirements
gap_patterns.description: No requirements specify how long data is retained or when it is purged
gap_patterns.recommendation: Define data retention periods, archival strategy, and secure deletion requirements

gap_patterns.name: Missing data classification requirements
gap_patterns.description: No requirements specify CUI categories or data handling procedures
gap_patterns.recommendation: Define CUI categories, portion marking requirements, and data handling procedures per NIST 800-171

gap_patterns.name: Missing performance/SLA requirements
gap_patterns.recommendation: Define response time targets, availability SLA (e.g., 99.9%), throughput requirements, and degradation thresholds

gap_patterns.name: Missing interface specification
gap_patterns.description: External system integrations mentioned but protocols/formats not specified
gap_patterns.recommendation: Define interface protocol (REST/SOAP/MQ), data format (JSON/XML), authentication, and ISA/MOU requirements

gap_patterns.name: Missing disaster recovery requirements
gap_patterns.description: No requirements for backup, failover, or disaster recovery
gap_patterns.recommendation: Define RTO/RPO targets, backup frequency, failover strategy, and DR testing cadence

gap_patterns.name: Missing incident response requirements
gap_patterns.description: No requirements for how security incidents are detected and handled
gap_patterns.recommendation: Define incident detection methods, response procedures, notification requirements, and escalation paths
